overview: Award winning director Max Bellochio directed a new impressive winner. The story is about two very competitive model agencies, one lead by red head Tarra White and the other by the new sensation of the USA Mr. Pete. Mr. Pete is accusing Tarra White of stealing his best models and has contracted a spion to infiltrate in her agency. An exciting story full of political games, blackmail and 5 scenes of hardcore sex with a healthy doses of anal.
title: Sex on Board
